description:
Nakadi is Zalando's central event bus. It provides event publishing / subscription in a RESTful way with guarantees regarding the quality of the content of events. Each event is of a predefined type with a schema which can be registered and looked up in Nakadi's schema registry.

On top, Nakadi provides out of the box Data Integration to Zalando's data lake.
## Components
### Open policy agent (opa)
The `opa` component is meant to detect the retailer_ids of application/token that is publishing or consuming from nakadi. This information is further used to detect ability to publish data with different ownership.

+ **Service URL :** https://nakadi-opa.aruha.svc.cluster.local
+ **SCM URL :** https://github.bus.zalan.do/aruha/opa
name: Nakadi Messaging Bus
subtitle: The Nakadi Event Broker Application
